name: Sonic 3D Blast ~ Sonic 3D Flickies' Island [SG]
description:
Sonic 3D: Flickies' Island (aka Blast) is an arcade game developed by Traveller's Tales. It was originally released in 1997. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Sonic 3D: Flickies' Island (aka Blast) is available on PC.
